text.tspan: Contested Simplified Skill Check using Intimidate
against one Character that can Perceive you. On Any
Success that Character is Frightened for two Rounds,
on Any Failure they are Frightened for one Round
any Success with an Attack Check you may move 2
Spaces, this Movement ignores any sources of Difficult
Movement and does not provoke Opportunity Attacks
First To Act (PA) - After determining which Character
will go first in Initiative for a Round you may choose to
go first instead. You Suffer 1 Drain
Exploit Vulnerability (PA) - Whenever you make any
Check against a Character with at least two unique
Detrimental Conditions you receive a +1 bonus on that
Combat Expert (PA) - All your Combat Techniques
Skillful (PA) - You gain three Skill Increases
you can choose to make two separate
Attack Checks instead with a -2 penalty
Vicious {1TP} - Attack Checks that result in
Hunter (PA) - When making an Attack or Skill Checks against an Opponent who is not within 2 Spaces of
another Opponent you gain +1 Bonus to that Check. Additionaly, Attack Checks that meet this requirement
Inflict 1 Additional Damage on any Success
Intimidate Mastery - Bow Before Me! (PA) - Attack Checks you make that were Exerted and result in any
Success Inflict the Frightened Condition until the end of the targeted Character's Turn.
